amendment.description: To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements for payments of $600 or more to corporations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Baucus motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit consideration of amendment SA 4713 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 254.

Baucus motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of amendment SA 4713 made in Senate. To repeal the expansion of information reporting requirements for payments of $600 or more to corporations, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Baucus motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit consideration of amendment SA 4713 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 254.
